msg: MRESOURCES-52 the output dir parameter is supposed to be java.io.File to work correctly with the -f switch or embedded use. Patch submitted by Benjamin Bentmann.

author: aconway
msg: The new --load-dir and --load options don't work with boost-1.33. This older version considers the option --load to be ambiguous.
This patch change --load to --load-module to remove the ambiguity.
